contributors.contributions: Created comprehensive combat guides and developed the popular AutoCombat mod. Expert in PvP mechanics and class optimization.

contributors.contributions: Discovered and reported over 50 critical bugs. Extensive testing of new features and mods. Reliable quality assurance contributor.
